name: TBubble
tag_list: music, musicians, models, dancers, bboyin, locking, entertainment, social-media, social-network, social-entertainment, networking, undiscovered-talent, undiscovered, talent, video, fashion, fan, artist, portfolio, photo, innovative, startup, new, boston,
overview:
TBubble is an innovative company that revolutionizes the idea of entertainment on the Internet. Our vision is to provide a platform that will allow up and coming talent to broadcast their talent and artistic passions in a manner that will command the attention of the entire entertainment industry.

At its foundation, TBubble is a social entertainment networking website built upon every niche of the entertainment industry. Members will have access to all the news about up and coming talents around the world, and most importantly, to venues where they can showcase their work in a professional environment filled with talent. TBubble is a home, a kaleidoscope of limitless creativity where anyone from models to musicians to dancers and fans; an infinitude of undiscovered talents commune freely, uninhibited by the shackles of serendipity.
